Hillsboro.Carnation, Oregon: Carnation is an unincorporated community in Washington County, Oregon, United States. Carnation lies on Oregon Route 47 on the south side of Forest Grove. Originally called South Forest Grove by white settlers, it was later dubbed Carnation after the flagship product of the Pacific Coast Condensed Milk Company, later called the Carnation Milk Products Company, which opened Oregon's largest condensery there in 1902.
